<rule id="springboot-di-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="spring-beans" groupId="org.springframework"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="potential" effort="1" title="Replace the SpringBoot Dependency Injection artifact with Quarkus 'spring-di' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the SpringBoot Dependency Injection artifact with Quarkus `spring-di` extension

                        Spring DI is in spring-beans artifact brought transitively by any `org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-*` dependency
                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-spring-di`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-di" title="Quarkus DI Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
